channel.title: Need Command ::Pure code
channel.description: Subject says all, I need the full code for ::Pure, I only have ::Master on my server so I wanted to add ::Pure for players with 0 player rights.

item.title: Need Command ::Pure code
item.dc:creator: @dy3p8ntrkid dy3p8ntrkid
item.description:
@dy3p8ntrkid wrote:

[quote=“RaZoR36, post:2, topic:279510”] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { addSkillXP(0, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(0, 2); addSkillXP(0, 3); addSkillXP(0, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(0, 6); addSkillXP(0, 7); addSkillXP(0, 8); addSkillXP(0, 9); addSkillXP(0, 10); addSkillXP(0, 11); addSkillXP(0, 12); addSkillXP(0, 13); addSkillXP(0, 14); addSkillXP(0, 15); addSkillXP(0, 16); addSkillXP(0, 17); addSkillXP(0, 18); addSkillXP(0, 19); addSkillXP(0, 20); addSkillXP(0, 21); addSkillXP(0, 22); addSkillXP(0, 23); addSkillXP(0, 24); sendMessage("Pure Genius.");
Just add 486000000 to the skills u want instead of zero[/quote]
thanks
